attributes.action: Replace speed cameras in urban areas with speed control traffic lights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In some other countries they use traffic lights which stop cars for a minute or so if they were travelling over the speed limit. 
This encourages drivers to keep within the speed limit to avoid being stopped, but doesn't breed the bitterness and uncertainty caused by speed cameras. They are especially effective at the entrance to villages or towns.
